channel.title: How do u make it so more people cna play on server
channel.description: Please some1 tell me, people are getting pissed at me![br][size=1]Posted at: September 09, 2006, 12:18:04 AM[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP ME, I REALLY NEED IT![br][size=1]Posted at: September 09, 2006, 12:30:02 AM[/size][hr]any1?

item.title: How do u make it so more people cna play on server
item.dc:creator: @opm881 opm881
item.description:
@opm881 wrote:

hey guys calm down. He obviously is a noob who dont know what hes doing ok man, this is what u do. Either set up a web server on your computer and make the page have a web based version of moparscape on it. Thats the more time consumeing for you, but it helps your players and plus then u can add stuff to the website and stuff. The other way is to get who ever wants to play to get moparscape and then tell them that to connect they have to go file->new ip/server and then enter your no-ip in there and then connect. Now im unsure of what scripts you have but i know if you use whitescape you have to manually make the characters for them ok. so just do that and you should be fine. i think there are scripts so u dont have to make the characters for them but im unsure. also, if i remeber correctly if you look through the tutorial list thread (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,18479.0.html) there is a thread about setting it up with mysql which im guessing, not this is just a guess, i havnt read the tutorial myself, but im guessing that it would make it so ppl can make their character from a website that u host. so yea, hope it helps

Read full topic
